page.title: 06Pets in Beckermet
page.content: From a survey carried out in school, the most popular pets were cats and dogs. The most popular breed of dog was the Border Collie. Other people keep farm animals as pets such as horses, hens, lambs and calves. Other pets which are popular are gerbils, goldfish,budgerigars, rabbits and tortoies. The majority of pets are fed on tinned food, some such as budgies eat dried food. I have a horse. In the winter I have to feed him on hay in the morning and night and in the afternoon he has hard feed called Coarse Horse. In the summer he does not need any extra food because the grass is enough for him to eat. In the winter I brush all the mud off his coat. When it is casting time I brush all his coat off.
